title: Here’s how to update the Apple Studio Display and improve your webcam quality
content:
Apple has released the beta of its promised update to improve the webcam on its Studio Display for camera tuning, contrast, noise reduction, and more. Follow along for how to download the Studio Display webcam fix update early.

more…

The post Here’s how to update the Apple Studio Display and improve your webcam quality appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed guide covers how to get Apple's Studio Display webcam fix early through the macOS Monterey beta.
